comment: Can't believe that you won't be my roommate anymore. Thanks for always being there and supporting me. We are almost the same person except the fact that you're shorter, lamer but far more intelligent than me. You're like a real brother. We know too much about eachother (no more illegal shit i swear)

comment: All hail the gawd! Thanks for tolerating our nonsense talks during IITISOC and getting us through the online semesters XD! You have always been there to help whenever needed and I hope you achieve all you want in life!
